sourcesContent:
import { Container, Typography, Button, Paper, Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; // icons import { FaHtml5, FaCss3Alt, FaJs, FaReact, FaGitAlt, FaDatabase, FaCode, FaTerminal, FaUniversalAccess, FaMaxcdn, FaPython, FaMobileAlt, FaNeos, FaNodeJs} from "react-icons/fa"; import useStyles from "./styles.js"; const About = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
about me

Nice to meet you I work as a software developer translating your business requirements to functioning websites and web applications with a combination of design, business and logic{" "}
Summary

Intersection of Code and Business The internet is the greatest reward to mankind as it offers us a wide range of choices and opportunities in contrast to outdated conventional ways where a group controlled what we know or do. This is my inspiration to being a developer because i can build anything i want. Software makes a real impact in peoples lives from blogs the shares awesome stories that inspire people to ecommerce stores that enable people to shop at the comforts of their homes to health systems that diagnose patients for free imporoving the quality of lives to search engines that save us years of college and expenses that go with to social media that connects people. Life was meant to be easy and the{" "} internet has made it and is still simplifying life for us. Soon we would not have to work and the robots will be working for us as we sit back and read.
Background

Following my Passion and Likes Conventional eductaion did not serve me as i expected, I failed terribly in school in topics like history, biology, chemistry and this impacted my view on life but this all changed when i joined college and pursued what i liked, Computer Science. I started excelling to the point where i discovered that doing what you love makes success a joke and life a game so i have been playing since 2018. I dived deeper into computer science topics which intoduced me to code, the primary factor that all technolgy is built upon and l loved code ever since. I am fueld with my passion for understanding systems and how they were built, how they work and their intended purpose. I consider learning as a life long activity because if you are not growing you are basically decaying. My hunger for knowledge and determination to apply it drove me to leave conventional academics for more practical uses of technology because i could make real change. I taught my self and never tired all the way because i loved making software. I belive in mindfullness, being engaged with whatever i am doing and has led be to the habit of spending most of my day infront of screens expect when i am cycling or playing football. I belive i have found my meaning in software. Apart from my full time commitments am takle interesting freelance projects for client facing different challenges. Reach out to lumungep12@gmail.com to connect.
Why Code?

Building without getting my hands dirty My family only considered certain professions as prestigious such as doctors, lawyers, engineers and such. First i did not have a liking to cramming lots of information without having prcatical applications but at the same time i wanted to make them proud. I wanted to build things so i could be called an engineer but i hated physics. Until i left high school and my world expanded i discovered that i can learn to build software. The path is not conventional compared to other engineering fields as in this field you are not dependant on someone to teach you but you own curiosity
What do i use?

My toolkit Html5 CSS3 Material UI Vanilla Javascript Node js React js Next js Python & Django Framework Git and Github SQL, Postgre, MongoDb Building & Consuming APIs Linux & terminal SEO & Accessibilty Responsive Design
My Principles

Effectiveness {" "} Learning is Life Long Process Consistency Know your Users
LET'S WORK TOGETHER Need a simple website or web application built or maybe some advice on how to approach your problem? Feel free to contact me. Currently my time books quickly, so the sooner the better.
); }; export default About;
